channel.title: Stroganoff on Bibmod
channel.description: Recent content in Stroganoff on Bibmod

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > Sci_fi_VTOL_Tank_Transporter [dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/sci-fi-vtol-tank-transporter

Id objet : sci-fi-vtol-tank-transporter

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-vtol-valkyries-vultures-skytalons-etc

Collections pour tags :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-vtol-valkyries-vultures-skytalons-etc NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

You're an infantry grunt fighting a battle in the distant future. Your platoon has gotten the upper hand over your enemy, and systematically wiping out all resistance. You hear the growl of turbo-jet engines on the horizon, and see a squadron of enemy VTOL transport jets quickly approaching. 
"Great," you think as you ready your rifle, "we'll take out the incoming troops as they disembark."
As they come in to land, you realize they're not troop transports, but instead each jet is dropping a light battle tank right in front of your lines! Your asshole clenches so hard that your cheeks cramp up, and your nuts retract so fast you feel them bruise your kidneys. All of a sudden you're not feeling so great about your chances!

This is an up-scaled version of one of my previous models, with extra detail added to make it suitable for a variety of popular air combat or small-scale tabletop wargames. Measurements are 84mm long, 28mm tall, 65mm wingspan. Up-scaling all components by a factor of 4 will suit larger-scale popular sci-fi wargames.

item.title: [PAYANT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > Sci_fi_Lancaster_Bomber [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/sci-fi-lancaster-bomber

Id objet : sci-fi-lancaster-bomber

Prix : 3 euros

Collections :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-bombardiers Maraudeurs

Collections pour tags :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-bombardiers Maraudeurs NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3

The classic historical bomber has been reinvented for warfare in the distant future! Who needs aerodynamics when you have four afterburner turbojet engines to brute-force your way passed atmospheric drag??

Currently scaled at approximately 1:300, with a 100mm wingspan and 100mm nose to tail. Includes landing gear to model a military airfield diorama, or closed landing gear to model in-flight.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > Stroganoff > 32_Hellstrike_Missile_Tree_for_Aeronautica_Imperialis [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4085865

Id objet : 4085865

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-bombardiers Maraudeurs

Collections pour tags :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-bombardiers Maraudeurs NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

32 Hellstrike missiles arrayed around a tree for optimal printing.

It printed perfectly on my Elegoo Mars, can't guarantee it'll work on FDM.

If anyone has an official AI Hellstrike missile, please let me know how close this is in scale so that I can adjust it.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > 1_4__Scale_Tiny_Tank_for_Human_Armies [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/epic-scale-leman-russ

Id objet : epic-scale-leman-russ

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic vehicules GI Imp-chars Imp-leman-russ

Collections pour tags :

  • epic vehicules GI Imp-chars Imp-leman-russ NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Originally produced by Games Workshop for their 6mm scale table top wargame, Epic 40,000 (and precessors/successors). They have since abandoned all support for Epic, so I modeled this in Autodesk Inventor for any avid wargamers.

Printed in an SLS machine, so can't give any advice on FDM settings, sorry!

Epic has been re-released as a titans-only game called Adeptus Titanicus. It is nominally 8mm scale instead of 6mm, so I suggest that anyone wanting to print this for AT scenery or to play 8mm Epic should upscale it by 125%.

Originally produced by Games Workshop for their 6mm scale table top wargame, Epic 40,000 (and precessors/successors). They have since abandoned all support for Epic, so I modeled this in Autodesk Inventor for any avid wargamers.

I haven't tried printing this model in an FDM printer so I can't recommend settings or methods of optimization.

Epic has been re-released as a titans-only game called Adeptus Titanicus. It is nominally 8mm scale instead of 6mm, so I suggest that anyone wanting to print this for AT scenery or to play 8mm Epic should upscale it by 125%.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > 1_4__Scale_Orbital_Tank_Transporter_for_Enhanced_Human_Armies [dl]

Id objet : epic-scale-landing-craft

Collections pour tags :

  • epic volants SMI Sm-barges-de-débarquement NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

A re-design of the original miniature produced by Games Workshop for their 6mm scale table top wargame, Epic 40,000 (and precessors/successors). They have since abandoned all support for Epic, so I modeled this in Autodesk Inventor for any avid wargamers who don't want to use proxies or pay through the nose for OOP official models off Ebay.

I haven't tried printing this model in an FDM printer so I can't recommend settings or methods of optimization.

Epic has been re-released as a titans-only game called Adeptus Titanicus. It is nominally 8mm scale instead of 6mm, so I suggest that anyone wanting to print this for AT scenery or to play 8mm Epic should upscale it by 125%.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > 1_4__Scale_VTOL_Personnel_Carrier_for_Human_Armies [dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/epic-scale-valkyrie-vendetta

Id objet : epic-scale-valkyrie-vendetta

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-vtol-valkyries-vultures-skytalons-etc

Collections pour tags :

  • epic volants IMP Imp-vtol-valkyries-vultures-skytalons-etc NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

Originally produced by Games Workshop for their 6mm scale table top wargame, Epic 40,000 (and precessors/successors). They have since abandoned all support for Epic, so I modeled this in Autodesk Inventor for any avid wargamers.

Modelled at true-scale 1:300 so it is larger than the official GW models; It may match the FW models since they care about scale!

Epic has been re-released as a titans-only game called Adeptus Titanicus. It is nominally 8mm scale instead of 6mm, so I suggest that anyone wanting to print this for AT scenery or to play 8mm Epic should upscale it by 125%.

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > Stroganoff > 1_4__Scale_Self_Propelled_Artillery_for_Human_Armies [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/epic-scale-minotaur

Id objet : epic-scale-minotaur

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • epic vehicules GI Imp-chars-artillerie Imp-minotaurs

Collections pour tags :

  • epic vehicules GI Imp-chars-artillerie Imp-minotaurs NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3
4
5

This model is designed for use in Games Workshop's 6mm scale table top wargame, Epic 40,000 (and precessors/successors). They have since abandoned all support for Epic, so I modeled this in Autodesk Inventor for any avid wargamers.

I don't believe there are any official rules for the Minotaur in Epic 40k, but I really like the look of this beast compared to the Basilisk. It adds a bit more variety, or allows the player to field a 30k-themed force.

Epic has been re-released as a titans-only game called Adeptus Titanicus. It is nominally 8mm scale instead of 6mm, so I suggest that anyone wanting to print this for AT scenery or to play 8mm Epic should upscale it by 125%.
